Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement)
This wool brocade cloak features a repeating pattern of squirrel heads and tree branches. It has 3 charges and regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
While wearing this cloak, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast the @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPlegionofrabids]{legion of rabid squirrels} spell from it. You donâ€™t need to be in a forest to cast the spell from this cloak, as the squirrels come from within the cloak. When the spell ends, the swarm vanishes back inside the cloak.
